alert.note: Alert for Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 14 at 11:19AM EDT until April 14 at 9:50PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Indiana, including the following county, Rush. * WHEN...Until 345 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1116 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated heavy rain yesterday. Minor flooding is occurring in Flatrock River near Raleigh, upstream of Rushville. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain fell. - Flatrock River upstream of and heading toward Rushville is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glenwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
